channel.title: How to rap on an Auxy track?
channel.description: I need help, I can’t figure out how to record my voice and rap on an auxy track I made. Can someone help me please.

item.title: How to rap on an Auxy track?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Or Ableton Live, of course, for pro.

Logic, Ableton Live, etc… are powerful, but relatively complex pieces of software, that can be intimidating.
The Ableton Live UI definitely stalled my interest in diving deeper for a while.

Over the coming years, I think we’ll start to see simpler UIs enter the DAW market, at the ‘pro-enough’ end of things.

Auxy are certain other mobile music apps are part of that movement. Just compare Auxy to something like iMPC, which is more of a legacy-style UI.

Yes, there’s a power differential at the moment, but I definitely think we’ll see ‘lite-but-pro’ DAWs, certainly as the notion of the mobile, professional musician gets proper traction.

Read full topic
item.source: How to rap on an Auxy track?

item.title: How to rap on an Auxy track?
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
You click on the scenes part of your song, and you will find an export button at the bottom. You click on that, and you can export your file from there however you chose to.

item.title: How to rap on an Auxy track?
item.dc:creator: viiitality
item.description:
Raising the Bar for the Future of Auxy Official Announcements
On a mission to change music It’s been 4 years since @Fredrik and I started Auxy. Our goal was to bring serious music production to mobile and empower a new generation of creators. We set out to build a different type of music app—simple yet powerful—that makes it easy to explore and realize your creative potential. How far have we come? I think the best way to judge our progress is to listen to tracks made by the community. We’ve been repeatedly amazed by how your music gets better with every …

item.title: How to rap on an Auxy track?
item.dc:creator: NEWNAMES
item.description:
record yourself rapping over your auxy track

take the vocals and put them over the auxy track in garageband or another DAW

and then export the track and upload to SoundCloud or YouTube or wherever

There you go! You should have an auxy track with your rap!
